articles.title: Dengue cases rise to 1,130 in Uttarakhand, 15 related deaths so far - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Dehradun, Sep 10 (PTI) The number of dengue cases has climbed to 1,130 in Uttarakhand where the mosquito-borne viral disease has so far claimed 15 lives, according to a state health department report.
articles.content: According to the report, 24 new cases of dengue were reported on Sunday, out of which 15 are from Dehradun, eight from Nainital and one from Udham Singh Nagar district.
